title: Why should I book a dedicated IPv4 address for my game server?
content: A dedicated IPv4 address allows you to use the default port, provides direct access to the DDoS manager, and can offer advantages during certain types of DDoS attacks.

title: Will choosing a different server location affect my ping?
content: Use the Ping Check tool to see your connection latency to each server location. This helps you choose the best location for minimal ping.

title: Does my server include all GTA 5 mods?
content: No, but you can upload compatible mods via FTP, ensuring they match the platform you use (FiveM, RageMP, Alt:V).

title: How quickly is my game server set up?
content: Most servers are ready within minutes of ordering.

title: How effective is your DDoS protection?
content: All servers at our Eygelshoven location use advanced DDoS protection from PletX. You can see a live demonstration here: https://www.twitch.tv/videos/2509694036

title: Do you support Foundry VTT?
content: We currently only offer Foundry via Steam as a pre-installed game server. Foundry VTT can be installed on VPS, root, or dedicated servers.

title: Which operating system do you use for Insurgency?
content: Insurgency runs on Linux. Insurgency: Sandstorm runs on Windows.

title: What happens if I choose a standard server instead of the recommended premium one?
content: Performance may be lower, depending on the game. If a premium server or higher RAM is recommended, using less may cause lag.

title: Is the Fjordur map available for ARK: Survival Evolved?
content: Yes, it is available and can be selected under 'Settings' in the web interface.

title: How much storage is available for FiveM servers?
content: Each game server has a soft limit of 50 GB. You will receive a warning when exceeding this and have 3 days to reduce usage.

title: Do you offer Team Fortress Classic servers?
content: Currently, itâ€™s not available, but you can suggest it here: https://zap-hosting.com/guides/docs/en/suggestions/

title: Do I need to configure my server on my PC?
content: No. All settings are managed via our web interface. We do not offer servers for PS4.

title: Is the Windows plugin for ARK compatible with Xbox?
content: No. The Windows servers are for the Steam version and are not compatible with Xbox.

title: Where can I find my Minecraft server address?
content: The IP address and port are displayed in your server's web interface.

title: Can I transfer my Minecraft save to a purchased server?
content: Yes, via FTP or our backup function.

title: Why did my FiveM server setup take longer?
content: Usually setup takes under a minute, but in rare cases it may take longer to ensure performance.

title: Do you install FiveM mods for me?
content: We offer one-click installation for popular mods, but do not manually install custom ones.

title: How much RAM is included for FiveM servers?
content: It depends on the number of slots. RAM details are shown in the shop.

title: What if my server setup is delayed?
content: In rare cases it may take a few minutes longer. You will be notified by email once setup is complete.

title: Can I request new Minecraft modpacks?
content: Yes, via https://zap-hosting.com/en/suggestion/ under 'Game request'.
